q.quote: When the flower blooms, the bees come uninvited.
q.author: Ramakrishna

q.quote: Ignorance is the curse of God; knowledge is the wing wherewith we fly to heaven.
q.author: William Shakespeare

q.quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
q.author: Ramakrishna

q.quote: I don't want to miss out on the chance of having a good time.
q.author: Victor Webster

q.quote: Death may be the greatest of all human blessings.
q.author: Socrates

q.quote: My mother taught me to treat a lady respectfully.
q.author: Chris Brown

q.quote: I'm learning a lot about myself being alone, and doing what I'm doing.
q.author: Chantal Kreviazuk

q.quote: I don't want to miss out on the chance of having a good time.
q.author: Victor Webster

q.quote: First, accept sadness. Realize that without losing, winning isn't so great.
q.author: Alyssa Milano

q.quote: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.
q.author: Victor Webster

q.quote: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.
q.author: John C. Maxwell

q.quote: Think where man's glory most begins and ends, and say my glory was I had such friends.
q.author: John C. Maxwell

q.quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
q.author: Victor Webster

q.quote: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.
q.author: John C. Maxwell

q.quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
q.author: Henry Rollins
